short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: csaccounts.com extension to view CS accounts in steam profile page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When viewing a steam profile page, you will be able to see their faceit and esea account embedded on the page.

*NOTE*: ESEA profiles will not work 100% of the time.
